title: About — SlideSnap AI
content:
About — SlideSnap AI








Support: hbhuisheng@gmail.com
SlideSnap AI is a mobile app designed for office and meeting scenarios to make document capture, meeting notes, and organizer-friendly note management simpler and more efficient.

Who it’s for
Meeting note takers: Quickly turn slides or whiteboard photos into structured minutes.
Business and research professionals: Collect meeting highlights and generate shareable summaries and action items.
Students and note enthusiasts: Organize photos and recordings from classes, lectures, or seminars into searchable study materials.

Key features and highlights

One-tap document creation: Capture photos or import images from your library to quickly create a “photo document” for easy organization and review.
Intelligent summaries: Generate clear summaries and suggested titles for images or meeting recordings so you can grasp key points quickly.
Speech-to-text with editing: Record meetings or voice notes and get live transcription, with the option to edit transcribed text for accuracy.
Multimedia aggregation: Combine images, audio, and text within a single document for convenient management and review.
Optional location tagging: Add capture locations to documents to organize and retrieve items by place.
Offline access: Documents and media are stored on your device so you can view captured content without a network connection.
End-to-end workflow: Capture, transcribe, analyze, and save — a smooth workflow that reduces repetitive tasks.

User experience highlights

Clean, intuitive interface: Quick access to create and view documents with minimal learning curve.
Editable transcripts: Update transcription content during or after recording to improve accuracy.
Automated suggestions: Save time with automatically generated summaries and recommended titles.
Privacy-minded design: Sensitive content can remain on-device; cloud analysis is performed only after explicit user consent.

Common use cases

Meeting minutes: Capture slide photos and generate meeting minutes for quick distribution.
Class notes: Record and transcribe lectures; combine with photo notes for comprehensive study materials.
Interviews / oral records: Record audio and receive editable transcripts immediately.

Getting started (for general users)

Open the app and tap “Create Photo Document” or “Record Audio.”
After capture, review the automatically generated summary and suggestions, and edit as needed.
For deeper analysis or export, choose the “Generate Minutes” or “Export” options inside the app.

Contact
Developer support: hbhuisheng@gmail.com

title: Auto-Renewable Subscription Agreement (iOS)
content:
Auto-Renewable Subscription Agreement (iOS)Update Notice: We recently updated the “Continuous Subscription Service Agreement.” This update primarily clarifies the pricing and renewal terms and improves related wording to make rights and obligations clearer and avoid ambiguity.
Effective date of this version: February 6, 2026
Welcome to SlideSnap AI’s auto-renewable subscription service for iOS.
Auto-Renewal OverviewThe auto-renewal feature is provided by Xi’an Xumao Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd. (“Company”, “we”, or “us”) for users of SlideSnap AI (“you”). When you opt in, Apple will charge your Apple ID payment method for subscription fees according to your chosen plan.
Please read this Agreement carefully and make sure you understand all terms, especially those that limit or exclude our liability. Minors should read this Agreement together with a legal guardian.
By enabling auto-renewal you confirm that you have read and agree to this Agreement. If you do not agree, do not enable auto-renewal.
Service DescriptionPrices may vary by region and taxes may apply. The applicable price will be shown in the App Store before you confirm your purchase.

To make purchasing or renewing SlideSnap AI paid products more convenient, we offer auto-renewable subscriptions through the Apple App Store. By explicitly enabling auto-renewal, you authorize Apple to charge your Apple ID payment method to pay for subscription renewals when renewal conditions are met.
This feature applies to all periodically billed subscription products offered by SlideSnap AI.

Enabling Auto-Renewal
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase.
Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified.
You can manage and cancel subscriptions in your Apple ID account settings (Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions).
If renewal fails for reasons outside the Company’s control (e.g., App Store issues, account limits, insufficient funds), your subscription will be treated as expired and the Company may suspend service. You bear any consequences arising from failure to renew.

Promotions, Pricing and Renewal Rules
The Company may, based on business needs or market conditions, adjust pricing, billing/renewal standards, or billing/renewal methods (collectively, the “Billing/Renewal Rules”). For App Store subscriptions, Apple will notify you of any price increase and you can cancel before the new price takes effect.
If you obtain subscription time extension via redemption codes or other non-payment methods, the start of auto-renewal shall be deferred until one day before the extended subscription period expires. For App Store purchases, the App Store renewal rules prevail.

Canceling Auto-Renewal
You can cancel auto-renewal via: Settings on your Apple device > Apple ID > Subscriptions > SlideSnap AI > Cancel Subscription.
If OS updates change cancellation paths, contact Apple Support for assistance.
Cancelling auto-renewal revokes your authorization for Apple to automatically charge your Apple ID, but does not affect charges already completed before cancellation took effect.
Regardless of the reason you stop using a paid product, you must proactively cancel auto-renewal for that product. If you do not cancel and a charge occurs, the Company will continue service for the paid period after a successful charge.

Agreement Amendments
The Company may amend this Agreement in response to internet development, legal/regulatory changes, or business needs. We will notify you of material changes by appropriate means (in-app notice, announcement, or other channels).
If you do not agree to an amendment, you may disable auto-renewal. Continued use of services after notice shall constitute acceptance of the amended Agreement.

Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
The formation, validity, performance, interpretation and dispute resolution of this Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the People’s Republic of China. If any provision of this Agreement conflicts with mandatory applicable law, that provision shall be interpreted or adjusted to the extent possible while maintaining the original intent; other provisions shall remain in effect.
Parties shall seek to resolve disputes amicably. If negotiation fails, either party may bring a claim in a court with proper jurisdiction or pursue other remedies as provided in applicable law or as agreed between the parties.

Miscellaneous
If the Company is unable to complete a charge or fulfill obligations due to force majeure or other circumstances beyond its control, we will notify users and handle the situation reasonably.
This Agreement, together with other agreements such as the Company’s Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and any service-specific rules posted by SlideSnap AI, constitute the complete rules governing your rights and obligations. In case of conflicts, this Agreement shall prevail unless otherwise expressly stated in other notices.
If you have questions regarding this Agreement, please contact SlideSnap AI customer support via the in-app support channel or through contact information published by the Company.

SlideSnap team.

title: SlideSnap AI Privacy Policy
content:
SlideSnap AI Privacy PolicyEffective date: January 16, 2026
OverviewThis Privacy Policy applies to the SlideSnap AI iOS application and related services (collectively, the “Service”). It explains what information we collect, how we use and share it, how we protect it, and your choices regarding your personal information. By using the Service you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
1. ScopeThis policy covers information collected or processed through the SlideSnap AI app, including data you provide directly and data collected via device sensors and system permissions. It does not apply to the privacy practices of independent third parties.
2. Information we collectWe may collect the following categories of information:

Account and registration information: name, email address, or other contact details you provide when registering or contacting support.
Device and technical data: device model, OS version, and basic diagnostics needed to operate and improve the app.
Usage data: feature usage, interaction logs, preferences, and activity history within the app.
Content data: documents, photos, images, audio recordings, notes, and any text recognized from images or audio (e.g., OCR or speech-to-text output) that you create or upload.
Location data: if you grant permission, the app may collect location coordinates to tag document creation or for optional location features.
Sensor/media permission data: camera, microphone, and photo library access when you grant these permissions.
Third-party interactions: data shared with or provided by third-party services you use through the app (for example, Gemini AI analysis).

3. How we use informationWe use collected information to:

Provide, operate, maintain, and improve the app and features.
Process content you create (e.g., run image or audio analysis to produce summaries or suggested titles).
Support cloud services, backups, or synchronization if available.
Respond to support requests and troubleshoot issues.
Analyze usage and performance in aggregated or de-identified form.
Send important service-related notices and security updates.

Note: When you choose to send images, audio, or text to a third-party AI service for analysis (for example, Google Gemini), that content may be processed and stored by the third party according to their policies.
4. Cookies and similar technologiesThe mobile app does not use browser cookies in the same way a website does, but embedded web views may use similar technologies (local storage, device identifiers). These are used for session management, preferences, and analytics where enabled.
5. Information sharing and disclosureWe will not sell your personal information. We may share data in limited circumstances, including:

Service providers: vendors who perform services on our behalf (e.g., AI processing such as Gemini, cloud storage, analytics, crash reporting). They are authorized to use your data only as necessary to provide those services.
Legal and safety reasons: to comply with legal obligations, respond to lawful requests, prevent fraud or abuse, or protect the rights and safety of users or the public.
Business transfers: in connection with mergers, acquisitions, or sales of assets, where user data may be transferred as part of the transaction.
Aggregated/anonymous data: we may share anonymized or aggregated information for research or analytics.

6. Data retention and deletionWe retain personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. User-created content (documents, media) is kept on-device or in customer-controlled storage until you delete it or your account is terminated. If you request deletion, we will take reasonable steps to remove your data from active systems and backups within a practical timeframe.
7. SecurityWe implement reasonable technical and organizational safeguards to protect data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. These measures include encrypted network channels (HTTPS/TLS), access controls, and secure development practices. No system is completely secure; if a breach occurs, we will notify affected users in accordance with applicable law.
8. Third-party servicesThe app may integrate or call third-party services (for example, Google Gemini for AI analysis, cloud storage, or analytics). When you use features that rely on third-party services, content you provide for processing may be transmitted to and temporarily stored by those providers. Please consult the respective third party’s privacy policy for details.
9. Children and minorsThe Service is not intended for children. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13 (or higher age where required by local law). If a parent or guardian believes we have collected information about a child, please contact us to request deletion.
10. Policy changesWe may update this Privacy Policy occasionally to reflect changes in practices or legal requirements. Material changes will be communicated via the app or other reasonable channels, and the effective date at the top of this policy will be updated.
11. Your rights and choicesDepending on where you live, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us using the details below; we will verify your identity before processing requests.
12. Contact
Developer: Xi’an Xumao Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd.
Contact email: hbhuisheng@gmail.com

title: SlideSnap AI — Subscription Management (iOS Only)
content:
SlideSnap AI — Subscription Management (iOS Only)Prices may vary by region and taxes may apply. The applicable price will be shown in the App Store before you confirm your purchase.
How do I cancel my subscription?You can cancel your SlideSnap subscription at any time.
To cancel your SlideSnap subscription on iOS:

Step 1 > Open the Settings app on your iPhone or iPad.
Step 2 > Tap your name (Apple ID) at the top of the screen.
Step 3 > Tap “Subscriptions.” 
Step 4 > Locate the SlideSnap subscription you want to cancel and tap it.
Step 5 > Tap “Cancel Subscription” and confirm.

Once cancellation is confirmed, you will not be billed again. You will retain access to paid features until the end of the current billing cycle.
Important renewal notes:

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.

How do I request a refund (iOS)?For purchases made through the Apple App Store, refunds are handled by Apple. To request a refund or report a problem:

Visit Apple’s Report a Problem page: https://support.apple.com/contact
Or open the receipt email from Apple and use the “Report a Problem” link.

If you need help locating your order or you believe there is an issue we can assist with, please contact SlideSnap support at hbhuisheng@gmail.com and include your App Store receipt or order number. We will help where possible, but final refund decisions for App Store purchases are made by Apple.
Why doesn’t my subscription work on my account?
Make sure you are signed in to the same Apple ID that was used to purchase the subscription. Purchases tied to an Apple ID will not appear under a different Apple ID.
If you subscribed without signing into a SlideSnap account in-app (some App Store purchases can be made while logged out), link your purchase to your SlideSnap account by signing in with the same Apple ID or follow the in-app instructions to restore purchases.
If you restored purchases and still do not see subscription benefits, try the following:iOS: Open the SlideSnap app → Profile (or Settings) → Restore Purchases.

If problems persist, please send us a screenshot of your subscription listing (from Settings → Apple ID → Subscriptions) and your SlideSnap account email to hbhuisheng@gmail.com.
Why was I charged more than I expected?
Check whether you purchased a monthly plan, an annual plan billed upfront, or a promotional bundle—annual or multi-month plans are charged once for the whole period and may appear as a larger single charge.
Review your App Store receipt for the exact amount and billing period.

If you believe the charge is incorrect, follow the refund steps above or contact hbhuisheng@gmail.com with your receipt.
What are auto‑renewable payments?SlideSnap uses auto-renewable subscriptions on iOS. When you subscribe, Apple will automatically renew your subscription at the end of each billing period and charge the payment method linked to your Apple ID unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the renewal date. Your account will be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can cancel at any time in your Apple ID Subscriptions settings to prevent renewal.
Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan on iOS?

Upgrade: To change to a higher-tier plan, you can subscribe to the new plan from within the app or the App Store. Depending on Apple’s billing rules, changes may take effect immediately with a prorated charge, or at the next billing cycle. Check the in-app upgrade flow for specifics.
Downgrade: If you switch to a lower-priced plan, the change may take effect at the next renewal date. If in doubt, cancel your current plan and subscribe to the desired plan.

I encountered errors while attempting to make a payment on iOS.

Ensure your Apple ID payment method is valid and has sufficient funds.
Restart the App Store and the SlideSnap app, then try again.
Sign out and back into your Apple ID if necessary.
If you see an App Store error, follow Apple’s guidance or contact Apple Support: https://support.apple.com/contact

If the issue appears specific to SlideSnap (app crash, restore purchases failing), please send screenshots, the device model, iOS version, and a short description to hbhuisheng@gmail.com so we can investigate.
Additional notes
App Store purchases are subject to Apple’s policies. SlideSnap can assist with account linking, restoring purchases, and providing receipts, but App Store billing and refunds are handled by Apple.
For account or subscription linking issues, use the app’s “Restore Purchases” function and contact hbhuisheng@gmail.com if you need further help.

ContactFor further assistance, email SlideSnap support: hbhuisheng@gmail.com

title: SlideSnap AI Terms of Use
content:
SlideSnap AI Terms of UseEffective date: January 16, 2026
Please read these Terms of Service (“Terms”) carefully before using the SlideSnap AI mobile application (the “App”). By downloading, installing, or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the App.
1. Acceptance of Terms
These Terms constitute the agreement between you and Xi’an Xumao Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd. governing your use of the App and related services.
We may modify these Terms from time to time. Material changes will be communicated reasonably; continued use after such changes constitutes acceptance.

2. Service description
The App provides tools for creating documents, recording and processing audio/images, and generating summaries and analyses. Specific features and availability are described within the App.
We may add, modify, or remove features, and may introduce paid or subscription-based functionality.

3. Accounts and registration
If the App requires an account, you agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of account credentials and for all activity under your account.
Notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized use of your account.

4. License and restrictions
Subject to these Terms, we grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to install and use the App on compatible devices.
You may not: reverse engineer, decompile, modify, distribute, sublicense, sell, or otherwise attempt to derive the source code of the App; or bypass any security or licensing mechanisms.

5. Purchases and subscriptions
In-app purchases and subscriptions are processed through the App Store (Apple) and governed by Apple’s policies regarding refunds and billing.
We may offer paid features; you will receive clear pricing and billing information before purchase.

6. User conduct
You must not use the App to: infringe rights of others, upload or distribute illegal, harmful, defamatory, obscene or hateful content, collect or post personal data of others without consent, or engage in fraudulent or illegal activities.
If you upload or submit content, you represent that you have the rights to do so, and you grant us a non-exclusive license to use, display, and process that content to provide the service.

7. Disclaimers and limitation of liability
The App is provided “as is” and “as available.” We make no warranties regarding uptime, suitability for a particular purpose, or error-free operation.
To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or business interruption, even if advised of the possibility of such damages.
We are not responsible for actions or results arising from third-party services used by the App (for example AI providers).

8. Intellectual property
All intellectual property rights in the App, content, interface, icons, and code are owned by Xi’an Xumao Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd. or licensors. You may not copy or redistribute such materials without permission.
If you provide suggestions, feedback, or improvements, you grant us a worldwide, royalty-free license to use them.

9. Changes to and termination of service
We may modify, suspend or discontinue the App or features at any time for any reason. We may also suspend or terminate access for users who violate these Terms.

10. Governing law and dispute resolution
These Terms are governed by the laws of the developer’s jurisdiction. Disputes will be resolved in the courts of that jurisdiction, unless mandatory law provides otherwise.
Before initiating formal disputes, parties should attempt to resolve matters through informal negotiation.

11. Contact
Developer: Xi’an Xumao Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd.
Contact email: hbhuisheng@gmail.com

12. Miscellaneous
If a provision of these Terms is held invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will continue in full force.
Failure to exercise a right does not waive that right.
